mapper.select: SELECT ROUT_GRP , RG.DL_CD_NM AS ROUT_GRP_NM FROM BMS_ROUT_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO RG ON A.ROUT_GRP = RG.DL_CD AND RG.CO_CD = 'ROUT_GRP'

SELECT A.ALLOC_ID ,A.SN ,A.NODE_ID ,C.NODE_NM ,C.NODE_TYPE ,DD.DL_CD_NM NODE_TYPE_NM ,A.NODE_SN ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.OPER_SN ,A.ROUT_ID ,B.ROUT_NM ,A.WAY_DIV ,A.COR_ID ,A.ARRV_TM ,A.DPRT_TM ,A.UPD_DTM ,A.UPD_ID FROM BMS_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST C ON A.NODE_ID = C.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DD ON C.NODE_TYPE = DD.DL_CD AND DD.CO_CD = 'NODE_TYPE'
WHERE ALLOC_ID = #{ALLOC_ID} AND A.ALLOC_NO = #{ALLOC_NO} ORDER BY ALLOC_ID, ALLOC_NO, OPER_SN, NODE_SN

INSERT INTO BMS_DAY_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO( OPER_DT ,SN ,ALLOC_ID ,NODE_ID ,NODE_SN ,ALLOC_NO ,OPER_SN ,ROUT_ID ,WAY_DIV ,COR_ID ,DPRT_TM ,ARRV_TM ,UPD_DTM ) SELECT #{OPER_DT} ,SN ,ALLOC_ID ,NODE_ID ,NODE_SN ,ALLOC_NO ,OPER_SN ,ROUT_ID ,WAY_DIV ,COR_ID ,DPRT_TM ,ARRV_TM ,UPD_DTM FROM BMS_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A WHERE ALLOC_ID = #{ALLOC_ID}
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE COR_ID = A.COR_ID ,DPRT_TM = A.DPRT_TM ,ARRV_TM = A.ARRV_TM ,UPD_DTM = A.UPD_DTM
